member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_CPSWS.MS_CPSWSAdapter.GetHierarchy(System.String,Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_CPSWS.SPPrincipalType,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: A method used to retrieve a claims provider hierarchy tree from a claims provider.
member.param: A parameter represents a provider name.
A parameter represents which type of picker entities to be included in the output claims provider hierarchy tree.
A parameter represents the identifier of the node to be used as root of the returned claims provider hierarchy tree.
A parameter represents the maximum number of levels that can be returned by the protocol server in any of the output claims provider hierarchy tree.
member.returns: A return value represents a claims provider hierarchy tree.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_CPSWS.MS_CPSWSAdapter.GetHierarchyAll(Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_CPSWS.ArrayOfString,Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_CPSWS.SPPrincipalType,System.Int32)
member.summary: A method used to retrieve a list of claims provider hierarchy trees from a list of claims providers.
member.param: A parameter represents a list of provider names.
A parameter represents which type of picker entities to be included in the output claims provider hierarchy tree.
A parameter represents the maximum number of levels that can be returned by the protocol server in any of the output claims provider hierarchy tree.
member.returns: A return value represents a list of claims provider hierarchy trees.

member.summary: A method used to retrieve schema for the current hierarchy provider.
